title: 服务器冰与火之歌怎么设置龙息不能破坏方块
author: lengshao233
txt_content: 如题，需要改什么配置文件吗，能否详细告知

replies.author: 喵内噶
replies.txt_content:
配置文件中修改
# Dragon griefing - 2 is no griefing, 1 is breaking weak blocks, 0 is default [range: 0 ~ 2, default: 0]     
I:"Dragon Griefing"=2
0默认，1破坏硬度低的方块，2不破坏方块

replies.author: 卑微小吴
replies.txt_content:
看看下面这几个插件
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-423865-1-1.html

https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-687966-1-1.html

这2个总有你需要的

replies.author: Qwe_Sakura
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-687966-1-1.html
康康这个？说出你的核心
